text: 11.19: Mt 9.10-14; Ru 7.35Mbe maaŋ ana nzuaim, Fhe Bakɨmen Guma Guar zɨgap, ana mba pav, mbɨ pim, mbe khaŋ ana nzuai, ‘Nde ana ganɨ. Ana mba kɨvgia pav, wain kɨvgia pi guma ma. Ana maaŋ mbuav ŋkɨɨa ndia rui gumgi, ana khurkhuman mbe khuuv, vhɨra tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi, ana vhɨra khurkhuman mbe khuui.’ Mbe maaŋ ana nzuai, ana Fhe Bakɨme ŋaara mbuim, mba ŋaar, mbe ana garim, ana ndɨkndɨk, ana guigira bigɨna guar ma.”
